name: SpruceID
long_description: SpruceID lets users control their data across the web. Instead of people signing into platforms, we imagine platforms should sign into peopleâ€™s data vaults. We implement this pattern into digital wallet ecosystems for governments, enterprises, and blockchains. We believe that architectures that enable individual autonomy in the digital world are necessary for free societies and dynamic economies to thrive.
one_liner: SpruceID lets users control their data across the web.
